CheckPages

resetButtons

public function resetButtons():void

Reset the display state of the buttons to correspond to the backing _buttonsData field

clearButtons

public function clearButtons():void

Clear the current display state and data of all buttons, ie, rever to an inactive state.  Also clears the backing data field.
